attributes.action: we have got no convidence in this govenment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
they have lied about inflation,being at two percent but it is really more like ten percent after the rises in food ,petrol, water, rent, council tax. energy bills. 
and they are  closing post offices!! about time we had an election before this country ends up revolts

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
